value:
Let's see... Lunch is taken care of. If
the weather changes, I have supplies.
All that's left is to confirm our route.

Sometimes we'd eat lunch in the
garden at the fortress... Those were
good times.

You're injured! Let me take care of
that. Let me also apologize for
permitting harm to befall you!

You may be surprised to hear that I
am an excellent cook. I hope that you
enjoy this meager meal I've made.

Now, to grate this cheese... Why
is it so hard? Grate, cheese! Argh!$k$pOh! I was just putting the finishing
touches on your meal. Please wait
just a moment.

You need not explain—I've been
briefed. My name is Flora. What
would you like to eat?
Leave everything to me.
It is my duty to protect my master.

I suppose my sister does outshine
me in combat. I apologize.

You have my deepest gratitude. I shall
continue to prepare lunches that are
as delicious as I can make them.

I am a maid. My name is Flora. I will
do my best to serve you, so please
don't hesitate to give me orders.

The warmth of the sunlight...is truly
a wonderful thing.$k$pI am of the Ice Tribe, and my body is
quite cold. Please, touch my cheek.
Do you see what I mean?$k$pUsually, I do very poorly in the heat...
But for some reason, I feel very
comfortable right now.$k$pPerhaps it is because you are beside
me.$k$pI hope that we never part. Promise
me...
それっ
Here I go.
きゃああっ！
Here's a taste!
Comin' right up!
All done?
Allow me!
May I have a vacation?
Hehe!
Please, let me handle all the picnic preparations.
Oh! I hope I didn't spill on my nice, clean outfit...
I've been told my cooking is considered to be quite delicious!
Today's lunch turned out quite well, if you ask me!
I hope that I didn't cool down your tea accidentally…
There is something delightful about a nice picnic.
Would you like me to arrange a wake-up for you? Or breakfast? Whatever you require, I can prepare it.
Anything else?
It's picnic time.
Delicious!
